question: Which of the following battles is subject matter of Alha Khand, a 12th Century epic poetic work in Hindi?
explanation: Paradidev (Parmal) who fought Prithviraj Chauhan-III in 1182 AD in the Battle of Mahoba. This battle is the subject matter of the Alha Khand (c. 12th Century) is an early poetic work in Hindi which consists of a number of ballads describing the brave acts
